description: NEXXO is building the NEXT generation, blockchain-powered, banking platform for under-banked micro and small businesses. There are more than 260 million micro and small businesses world-wide that are under-banked and under-serviced, and the NEXXO solution is designed from the ground up to address such an unfulfilled need. NEXXO partners with local banks and with local central bank regulators to build a global banking platform that betters the lives of micro & small business owners and operators, their families, their communities, and their surrounding ecosystem.
name: Nexxo
